pkgmetadata.longdescription: Develop a 'Telegram Bot' with R // Provides a pure interface for the 'Telegram Bot API' http://core.telegram.org/bots/api. In addition to the pure API implementation, it features a number of tools to make the development of 'Telegram' bots with R easy and straightforward, providing an easy-to-use interface that takes some work off the programmer.
